thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 2 of 54
thread.title: Anthony Gaglione

author: Anthony Gaglione
title: Anthony Gaglione
text: I've been buying from WLL for about four years now and not only is the merchandise and products great, but the staff is knowledgeable and helpful. Their website is so informational and they are extremely generous with their tips and tricks and information. Shipping is insanely fast whether it's just coffee or a higher-end heavy item. I've ordered two high-end coffee machines from them and they literally arrived at my door the next day. Great perks, rewards back and prices are excellent. Can't say any more...
